content.html:
A bit about me

Interests: technology, exploring, cider.

I also have accounts on Github and Facebook.

Mike P . Cambridgeshire UK

Stuff

Like all good piles of stuff, you never know what you might find if you rummage through it, but the chances are most of it will be junk.

Amongst the junk in this pile, you will find:

  • Some information on the British railway.
  • A somewhat inflexible tool for predicting the passes of satellites, including the International Space Station.
  • A list of local amateur radio repeaters.
  • Some rather questionable scientific observations.
  • Resources related to various games.
  • Some weather forecast information that I haven't found elsewhere.
